name: Real Printer 1
description: A basic cheap printer that is easy to use and has a large community of users.

name: Benchy
description: A basic test print that is used to test the quality of a printer.

name: Hydroponics kit
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.

name: white PLA filament
description: 1 gram of white PLA filament for an FDM printer.

name: Edison Model M
description: A futuristic electric vehicle with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities.

name: portable solar panel
description: A portable solar panel that can be used to charge your devices. Supports USB-A and USB-C ports, and it has a 110V AC outlet, with support for 200W at peak sunpower.

name: 1 kWh battery pack
description: A 1 kWh battery pack that can be used to store energy from a solar panel or a wind turbine.

name: 500W wind turbine
description: A 500W wind turbine that can be used to generate electricity.

name: Benchy Award
description: A trophy granted for printing your first Benchy.

name: Real Hydroponics Tub 1
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.

name: basil seeds
description: A packet of basil seeds.

name: rocket
description: A 3D-printed rocket that can be used to launch small payloads into space.

name: green PLA filament
description: 1 gram of green PLA filament for an FDM printer.

name: rockwool starter plug
description: 1 starter plug for hydroponic seed germination. Dunk it in water for 5 minutes, then place some seeds in the planting hole.

name: hydroponics nutrients
description: A bottle of hydroponics nutrients that can be used to grow plants. NPK: 9-3-6

name: 3D printing kit
description: A kit that contains all the parts you need to get started with 3D printing. Everything is fully assembled.

name: 5 gallon bucket
description: A 5 gallon bucket that can be used to store water or other liquids.

name: 5 gallon bucket of water
description: A 5 gallon bucket of water.

name: Motor Award
description: A trophy granted for being one of the first people to buy an Edison Model M

name: Rocket Award
description: A trophy granted for printing your first model rocket.

name: dCarbon
description: A semi-fungible token that is generated for every 1 kg of carbon dioxide generated in-game.
